items.content_html: A lightweight fetching library packed with essential features - retries, interceptors, request deduplication and much more, all while still retaining a similar API surface with regular Fetch.
items.title: zayne-labs/call-api: A lightweight fetching library packed with essential features - retries, interceptors, request deduplication and much more, all while still retaining a similar API surface with regular Fetch.

items.content_html: ts3pi is a lightweight Google Chrome (and Chromium-based browsers) extension that helps you record, categorize, and manage web pages you visit. Easily export your saved URLs in CSV, JSON, and HTML formats or import a list from a JSON file.
items.title: akritiko/ts3pi: ts3pi is a lightweight Google Chrome (and Chromium-based browsers) extension that helps you record, categorize, and manage web pages you visit. Easily export your saved URLs in CSV, JSON, and HTML formats or import a list from a JSON file.

items.content_html: EnvRuntimeGuard is a lightweight runtime environment variable validator for Node.js and frontend applications. It ensures that required environment variables are set, validates types, enforces allowed values, and masks sensitive data in logs.
items.title: vladavoX/env-runtime-guard: EnvRuntimeGuard is a lightweight runtime environment variable validator for Node.js and frontend applications. It ensures that required environment variables are set, validates types, enforces allowed values, and masks sensitive data in logs.

items.content_html: Legcord is a custom client designed to enhance your Discord experience while keeping everything lightweight.
items.title: Legcord/Legcord: Legcord is a custom client designed to enhance your Discord experience while keeping everything lightweight.

items.content_html: Nesty-Backend is a lightweight library that brings decorator-based routing and middleware support to Express.js, making your backend code cleaner and more structured

items.content_html: PineTS is a lightweight, open-source TypeScript framework that recreates key Pine Script™ features and syntax in JavaScript. It enables developers to write, port, and experiment with PineScript-like indicators outside of TradingView’s environment.
items.title: alaa-eddine/PineTS: PineTS is a lightweight, open-source TypeScript framework that recreates key Pine Script™ features and syntax in JavaScript. It enables developers to write, port, and experiment with PineScript-like indicators outside of TradingView’s environment.

items.title: lit/lit: Lit is a simple library for building fast, lightweight web components.

items.content_html: This project is a lightweight web application developed with ReactJS and TailwindCSS. It enables the visualization of 3D point cloud data and incorporates basic GIS viewing features.
items.title: canyon/3d-web-viewer: This project is a lightweight web application developed with ReactJS and TailwindCSS. It enables the visualization of 3D point cloud data and incorporates basic GIS viewing features.

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript library for converting decimals and strings into accessible, screen-reader-friendly fractions. Generate MathML for enhanced accessibility and ensure inclusive fraction display on the web.
